name: RØG 2
description:
You're a Viking who fell off the ship during a storm. Trying to find a living soul, you fall into the dark realm of Helheim, full of dangerous creatures and winding tunnels. Get out of the cave you're in and discover its secret.

Controls:

  • WASD/Numpad2468 - walking
  • F/Numpad7 - attack/destroy
  • G/Numpad5 - use/pick up/open
  • H/Numpad9 - drink potion
  • V/Numpad1 - drop weapon
